spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room sequence are preserved. However, the width of the main living area is slightly compressed, and door swings do not always match the 2D swing directions exactly.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent fidelity in removing roof and maintaining visibility. No text or UI elements present. Minor wall interpretation issues near the entrance and kitchen partitioning.

furniture_mapping.notes: Good clean block-style furniture. Bed and sofa placement aligns with the plan. Dining table orientation is correct.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. Isometric camera is correctly implemented. Shadows are soft and non-dramatic as required.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortions in the kitchen cabinetry and entrance foyer partitions compared to 2D plan.
Slight reinterpretation of the balcony door openings and window frame subdivisions.
